short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the improved Howl.Link extension for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have clarity and confidence when creating monetzable links to your favorite products on the internet. Not only will you know if a link is monetizable when you land on the page, but you'll also be able to see the commission rate before you create it.

Creators use Howl.Link to:

Start earning faster - Create Howl links from any e-commerce website in seconds to start earning when shoppers buy from your posts.

Post from any platform - Howl links work on any social commerce platformâ€“from YouTube, Instagram, and Twitter to TikTok, Substack, and Twitch.

See which links are driving sales - get detailed & fully transparent breakdowns on which links are earning & from what platforms on your Howl dashboard.

Collaborate with teammates - multiple team members can create and use howl.me links for the same account.

Questions or feedback? You can find us at  hello@planethowl.com.
